channel.title: Auto cache download.. pleaase help

item.title: Auto cache download.. pleaase help
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Jig Dr Jig
item.description:
@Dr_Jig wrote:

Hey sorry to be a pain guys but some of you might have seen that I last made a thread about the background of the login screen. well I have updated that done and I have updated some things in the cache. now I need help doing the auto cache downloader so it download and extracts to c: drive. my client already has an auto download and extract but what I don’t know how to do is make it download and extract my new cache. I think my current one uses dropbox

this is what is is my “cache downloader” file atm I don’t know how to get that link for my new cache. and is there anything els I have to do in any other folders?

*This is where the Cache downloader coding starts
/
private final int VERSION = 5;
private String cacheLink = “https://dl.dropbox.com/u/91577463/TrisidiaX%20Cache/TrisidiaX%20V3%20Release%20Cache.zip”;
/
*Cache Downloader Ends
**/

If someone can help me either by replying or going on Skype id really appreciate it. any way that someone can download the client and hit run and be ready to play would be good to know how to do. I don’t wat tot have ppl download the client then have to extract the cache to their C drive manually. my Skype. is cody.way2

Read full topic
